item.title: Bitcoin has surrendered the rally. Why it didn’t bounce after a whale unloaded the cryptocurrency.
item.description: A whale sold a chunk of bitcoin over the weekend, and on Monday, the cryptocurrency was dragging the rest of the sector south.
